title: LF SUPPORT TO DUO WITH (SILVER IV)
body:
Hi all. I'm looking for a support player to duo with in FLEX and then eventually move onto doing my placements in solo/duo ranked. 

**Age:**
20

**Champions I play:**
-Lucian
-Draven
-Tristana
-Jinx
-Vayne

**Requirements:** 
-Teamspeak or Discord
-16+ (Closer to my age the better)
-Chilled guy or girl that wont get mad (Constructive criticism appreciated) 

**Contact:** 
Add me for a chat. "Hazardau"

replies.body:
Sent a req, Discord GG#871
Lets climb!
Added you in game, looking forward to working with you.  I obviously have discord.
Hey, I've sent you a request. I main support, have discord, 22 y/o, IGN is "Indy Savvy". Discord ID: Indy#5314
